page.title: 20PLAYTIME GAMES THEN & NOW.
page.content: In our survey of people in the village,we asked them,"What was your favourite playtime game at Primary School?"The most popular non-sporting game was{HOPSCOTCH}followed by{TIG}and {MARBLES.}Among some of the more unusual games were{WHIPS AND TOPS.}The most popular sporting playtime games were{SKIPPING AND FOOTBALL.} In our school now the most popular non-sporting playtime games are{ {HANDSTANDS,ELASTICS}and among the older children{KISS-CATCH.}There are also{ROPE SWINGS}to use.The most popular sporting playtime games are football in winter and cricket in summer. {THIS DOMESDAY PROJECT HAS BEEN WRITTEN {BY THE CHILDREN IN MISS REDSHAW'S AND {MR.RILEY'S CLASSES NORTH FERRIBY {SCHOOL. { }
